overview:
Chris Wilson is a fanatic of all things marketing and branding.

Chris is a Brand Strategist at Hester Designs, where through creative problem solving, strategy and design, he develops marketing and branding solutions that work. He is also the Social Media Marketing Adviser to uVizz Media. An innovative thought leader in the industry, Chris is an active contributor in the social media space and shares his thoughts at his blog, The Marketing Fresh Peel.

Located in Oklahoma City, Chris serves clients throughout the United States.
